content.detailedDescription: Two redish round-like objects flew over my home going east to west. they were going too fast to be jets or any other man-made/normal mode of air transport we have. also it was how they flew over my home and toward the west that was the most amazing. they were in unison for a few seconds then the object on left sped up (as if they were not already going faster than anything we have on this planet). when object on the left sped up, the object on right started darting back and forth (faster/slower) and then got closer to object on left. as i watched them, the object on the right then began to go around the object on the left in sort of a half-circular pattern from front to back over and over and then both objects sped up more, as if that is possible again and i lost sight of them as they headed out toward huntington beach and other beach cities.
content.summary: Two objects in unison then one sped up rapidly and sort of teased other object by going around it back and forth very fast!

content.detailedDescription: I saw what looked to be a star,but with binoculars was unexplainable and amazing.
content.summary: Hovering orange golden diamond

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 6:15pm on august 23, 2013 my wife and i were traveling south along n 11 mile corner road, just outside of casa grande, az. we were traveling at 55 - 60 mph and had just passed the intersection of n 11 mile corner road and e. kleck rd. it was daylight and the sun was above the horizon and to our right (west). we were and remain unable to identify a large shape we saw moving through the sky at that time.

initially, i noticed a large shape to my 10 o'clock at 15 - 20 degrees off the horizon. it was about three quarters of a mile distant and was moving east to west, parallel to highway 287 (about 1 mile away) and perpendicular to our direction of travel. i was about to dismiss the shape as a flock of birds until shimmering and/or reflected light caught my eye. i noted the shape undulated and flowed as would a flock of birds, but there were no birds visible in or around the shape. the shape was translucent with a diffuse edge. i could see sky through the shape. i commented to my wife, "what is that?" as i slowed the vehicle.

my wife acknowledged seeing the shape and expressed curiosity as i continued to drive. she agreed this was not a flock of birds and was similarly unable to identify what we were seeing. we observed the shape for about 10 seconds before it descended slightly and disappeared behind some trees: long enough to capture our interest but not long enough to get at the iphone to document the event. the shape reappeared a second or two later and changed direction. we further observed the shape for less than 5 seconds before it seemingly blended into the background and disappeared.

after initially sighting the shape, it passed behind a water tower located west of n 11 mile corner road. the tower is about 60 feet in height. we were roughly a half mile from the tower as the shape passed behind it. the shape was roughly 3 times the height of the tower with a length to height ratio of about 4 to 1. an absolute size for the shape is difficult to estimate as the shape was some distance beyond the tower.

the shape had no markings and appeared to be under its own power. the overall geometry was rectangular. it narrowed slightly at west end. corners were poorly defined and slightly rounded. the shape appeared thin, almost ribbon-like. my wife remarked it resembled a transparent advertising banner that moved like a flock of birds as it reflected sunlight and shimmered. it lacked a tow plane or any notable form of propulsion.

within several seconds of passing behind the water tower the shape banked / rolled toward the ground and disappeared behind a growth of trees. it emerged several seconds later moving in a new direction - south. we lost sight within a few seconds of its reappearance as the it simply blended into the background.

the shape appeared to be following a newly installed line of high tension power lines. the turn south corresponded to the location where the power lines turned south.

the overall speed of the shape is in question. given the distance to the shape and covered during the sighting, i estimate the speed to be between 60-100 mph. comparatively, it was far faster than a flock of birds but a bit too slow for an aircraft.

the observation was not a traditional ufo. it was unusual and unexpected. it was almost as if we were seeing a cloaked object from some science fiction movie. it shimmered and occasionally reflected light. it had an overall outline to it, albeit a poorly defined outline. you could see blue sky through the shape. it had no remarkable shape.

the sighting happened quickly enough that there was no time to open and start the photo ap in the iphone. all we had along at the time.
content.summary: Large, shimmering, translucent shape in daylight sky over southern arizona

content.detailedDescription: My niece lily had told me of a strange object she had seen and i was explaining to her that i had also seen one, right around her age (9). and took it as nothing more than her imagination. i was standing outside..I believe it was alittle after midnight and i was texting my friend and happened to look up, for satellites or anything really, and happened to catch a form, but not at first..Now my eyes were adjusting to the darkness after my cellphone but as i looked up after i rubbed my eyes a few times i realized i was looking at something...That i have never,ever seen. we live close to an airport so helicopters and planes are a regular sight and experience for me, but this object... i know.. was not of this world or anything we've known. it was 5 lights, slowly pacing and crossing eachother, so immediately i thought meteorite crossing a shooting star, or a satellite or vice versa, so i was excited! then realized nothing burned out..Or faded away. i tried to record it on my phone and have the original recording but there wasn't enough to actually dissect to make me feel better. i'm not religious nor am i a believer of the after life, but i can tell you right now that i am now a believer of beings not of our soil, and i feel pig headed for not evaluating or knowing it sooner... this made me take a step back and really think.. whole heartedly on what is really out there.. and how i perceive it.. i don't want to feel like i'm crazy.. at all. but i know what i saw... i can't deny that.. i saw it.
content.summary: Unexplainable.. i have never, ever seen anything like it.

content.detailedDescription:
Our kids filmed some strange objects in the sky near urbandale, ia on august 12th and have seen them every night since then. they have not filmed them more than two or three times. they were out watching a meteor shower on the 12th (or the 11th?) and noticed an object that seemed to defy physicsanger hat changed colors. when they slowed down their video footage, you could see all colors of the rainbow. this was a mind altering event for them but they have been looking for the objects every night and have been seeing them and it seems that every night they are seeing more. tonight, the 27th, they came inside sometime after eleven and got my husband and me. i went outside right away. before my husband joined us, there were four teenagers with me in the driveway. we could see one object across the street above a neighbor's house that looked like it was far away but within the atmosphere and it was somewhat stationary but changing colors and moving back and forth and up and down. sometimes in small circles. north of that one, there were two more that appeared closer. one was faint but the other grew very bright as it was changing colors and then just disappeared. the second one also disappeared. the very first one remained there for about 10-15 more minutes and it gradually descended out of our sight line. the kids had seen some to the east and they all disappeard when i came outside. my husband only witnessed the one to the west that stayed there the longest. they all appeared round and to be changing colors and maybe shape. they also appeard to be far away yet still in our atmosphere. we saw planes flying overhead as this was happening. 
i had seen the footage and heard plenty of stories of the sightings of these objects over these past weeks from our kids and our friends  but this was the first time i saw any of it. it is hard to wrap my brain around it. especially the one that became brighter and then disappeared. when my son asked me to come out to look he said they had counted 12 and when i first went outside i felt overwhelmed because it was so hard to differentiate between a star and these strange objects but once i figured out how to spot them i felt like we were surrounded and strangely, like we were being watched. but they looked so far away. so strange. by the time we went inside, there were just normal things like stars and airplanes in the sky as far as we could tell.
content.summary: Our kids have been seeing these objects since august 12th & could see them from our driveway tonight.First time i've seen them.

content.detailedDescription: I will start by saying that i am still in a state of shock and was not a real believer in ufo's until now. i had awaken from my short nap on the sofa and called my husband out of the bedroom to come outside to help put the cars in the garage. when we came out of the house, i looked up in the sky and immediately said to him, "what is that in the sky?" it was twirling with white lights and appeared to be very bright and oval to round shape. it has appeared in this area from july 5th until the present. it appears just as the sun goes down and remains in that spot for approximately 2-3 hours every night. i have taken pictures and videos. my husband thought that it was a star but now he knows that it can't be. i thought maybe it could be something that the authorities put up there to watch everybody. the third day that i came outside to observe this object is what changed my life forever. i video recorded the evening and stated that i would come back out later to check the object at a later time. when i came back outside at about 9pm, i looked up to the sky where it was hovering and it wasn't there. i turned slightly to my right to find it silently moving, invisible with small lights surrounding the huge oval to round shape object. it was moving very slowly and quietly with a slight sputter just at tree length. it also had a haze or a slight fog around the object. i noticed that while i was outside watching it, there were no crickets, frogs or dogs in the area making any sounds. it was very still in the surrounding area. i quickly video recorded what i could and then ran in the house. i really just want it to leave.
content.summary: I discovered this bright object in the sky beginning on july 5,2013 and it remains in the sky once the sun starts to go down. it appears to be very bright and round with colors sometimes of red, yellow and orange.

content.detailedDescription:
We have been seeing flickering lights from our back porch since aug 13, 2013. it started with us seeing a big round flying object on aug 13, 2013 around 5am. we were coming from hwy 44 towards nixa through james river xpwy. we noticed the object when we were still on 44 - it had a very weird trajectory it was flying back and forth on top of springfield. we thought it was a police helicopter looking for someone but then we noticed how fast it was accelerating and stopping and hovering.. we kept it in sight and we got to campbell by republic road as it was crossing over the street from left to right it was close enough and low enough that we could see the shape and it was round... we tried going the direction it was going. we pulled over on one side road off of campbell and we could see kind of a valley by republic road and it hovering over what looked like a factory or a power plant and it eventually got too low to the ground for us to see it. 
since then we started paying attention to the sky and noticed very weird "stars". from our porch every night we can see at least two stationary and sometimes some moving "stars" that flicker red green and blue. we are both photographers and have some equipment so we have been taking pictures of it ( 200mm zoom ) so we have a lot of pictures of stationary and moving lights ( always changing colors ... we rapid fire when we shoot and then see frame by frame how its changing colors ) the other day we shot what looked like a plane moving at night with lights flickering but when we zoomed in on it we could see that it was exactly the same shape as one of those "stars" but flying. oh and the last fact is that two of these stationary "stars" that we see every night appear always in the same spot but after midnight they start moving .. sometimes very fast ... and next night they are back. i am not sure what these are but i can send you pics of them ( in some pics you can even make out the shape of some structure or smth behind that light(s)  )
it would be interesting to know what these are and/or possibly look at these things through a big telescope ( we looked through a smaller one look exactly like from our 200mm zoom )
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Disk flying in different directions, flying flickering/pulsating objects

content.detailedDescription:
I am located north of dallas in the flight path of both dfw airport and love field. i went out front to check my sprinkler system and looked up to see a very bright venus. at that time i heard a commercial jet overhead and looked up to see a bright light similar in size to venus moving east to west at a steady speed. the commercial jet i heard was also visible moving south to north and readily identifiable as an airliner. the object was a constant, very bright white in color with no strobe lights. commercial airliners and smaller planes were visible at the same time for comparison and contrast. (the airspace over frisco, texas is always busy with various aircraft.) i went inside to get my son to come out and see the object with me. when we came back out, it was still visible and was now veering towards the southwest in a very wide arc (not abrupt). it continued southwest at a constant speed out of sight. the direction and estimated altitude of the object was opposite to the typical air traffic for dfw and love field normally observed in this area. strobes are easily observed on aircraft up to as high as visible with the naked eye, but this object was a constant very bright white light. 

immediately following the passing of this object, another object was observed also moving from east to west. this object was either much higher or much smaller than the first object as it appeared more the size of star in the night sky. again, all manner of civilian aircraft were visible in the area at the same time. there were no strobe lights visible. it was a constant star-like light moving at a constant velocity that was not especially fast. as my son and i were watching, the object brightened for a split-second and returned to it's previous brightness. a tree across the street blocked our view. we moved on foot 70 feet or so eastward down the street to clear the tree and could no longer observe the object.
content.summary: Bright star-like object like venus moving, followed by smaller object that brightened

content.detailedDescription: My kids and their mother were driving down route 70 east when they saw a ufo hovering over farm land.  it began to move slowly, but not going any where in much distance.  it was as high as a 10 story building.  they immediately knew it was an ufo and not a helicopter, blimp or weather balloon.  it had 3 white lights shine below the craft that only descended 20 feet.  the lights were a continuous bright light for the full 20 feet.   after several minutes, a second ufo with red outside lights appeared and hovered next to the first ufo.  they were very frightened and  went to the nearest store.  there were some observers there but they said they did not know what it was and then it went behind trees.  after 15 minutes, they left the store and once again saw the 2 ufo"s. as the drove down rt 70 a third ufo joined the other two and formed a triangle and slowly climbed upwards.  they lost the ufo's behind trees and were too scared to try and follow them.  i have attached a picture taken from a cell phone.  it is a picture of a green light.  however, my son said the light was not green when he took the picture, it was white.  i am not sure why it came out green.  if you enlarge the picture on a computer and not a cell phone and look to the right and a little below  the green light, you can see the shape of the ufo.
content.summary: One ufo waiting to be reunited with 2 others before forming a triangle and leaving

content.detailedDescription:
this past saturday night i was at lake arcadia around 12:30-1:00 in the morning fishing for catfish. i was fishing out of this old juan boat and there was absolutely no one else on the water. the only other people that i saw out there that evening was a group of 12 to 15 people around a fire on a campsite  on opposite side of the like. believe me, you could tell and hear that they were there. however there was no one at that site for a while before the sighting.
	i was getting ready to leave when about 60 to 75 yards behind me.  a giant bright and glowing light appeared under the lakes surface. it was fairly large and had a light green green color to it with a rhythmic flashing of red and blue lights. 
	then the light began moving from western side of the lakes shore to the  eastern side and back to the other side a couple of times then it stopped almost near the center of the lake. at that moments it grew brighter and slightly larger than shot straight up in the air and into the sky and seemingly disappeared for a couple of seconds and reappered hovering right over the campsite that i mentioned earlier and disappeared again. then reappeared again maybe a minute later and shot up into the sky and went out of sight and i never saw it again.
	i drove my boat over to the site where the craft was hovering over as fast as i could get there. however, i did not recognize anything out of the ordinary. just a white ford truck with several bags of trash in the bed and a couple other sitting beside it. i did not see any one by the truck or in the immediate area.
content.summary: Light appeared under lakes surfaced and shot out and hovered over campsite

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was headed to the store on friday night, august 23, 2013, when i noticed an odd floating orange light. when leaning to look closer, i realized there were hundreds of these things floating on the same path. i immediately pulled over into a parking lot where many others were gathered to watch this strange event. it lasted roughly 20 minutes. the "lights" were at a floating pace, none zipping or streaking through the sky, and no sound seemed to come from them. after travelling about 100 yards passed us, they would gently flicker and then were gone. i inquired with my local news channel but got no response, and no one seemed to be airing any news of this. i took several photos, some on my canon, others on my cell, but no one seems to know what this was. i googled it and found that at roughly the same time, the same thing occurred in new york state as well...Also new zealand, london, illinois, and texas that same weekend. wtf? i am including the 3 pics i took from my cell, but the poor quality causes the lights to look streaked, which they were not. i have a few that i took with my canon as well that i would be glad to share if needed. (don't have it with me here at work).
content.summary: Hundreds of orange floating lights on same path

content.detailedDescription:
On june 4th, at 11:50 i was driving west just on the outskirt of kamsack, sk,when i noticed a bright object in the sky, to my left, through the driver-side window. i then noticed another object behind it. it looked similar to what i saw a few weeks ago, which appeared to be three satellites travelling in a row. i had mentioned this previous event to my passengers, so we stopped and got out to look thinking this could be the same phenomenon. we then noticed there were more than three of these objects. we counted at least 12 of them. we were on a hill with the lights of the town visible to our east. 

for all intents and purposes they behaved exactly as satellites, except there was a "convey" of them. i have never seen anything like this, and i'm always looking at the sky. the objects did not form a straight line, they were randomly spaced, not unlike notes on a musical staff, but they all moved in sync. the objects took up the entire southern hemisphere. they did not vary their altitudes or speeds. 

i had an incredibly strange sensation, mostly psychological, not physical. i mentioned to the other two observers how strange this was and that it reminded me of recurring dreams i had as a child. in these dreams the entire night sky would come alive with fantastical lights of varying shapes. the two other witnesses also commented that they could not believe what we were seeing. 

the entire incident lasted approximately 5 minutes. we did have video cameras, but the footage is difficult to discern since we couldn't see the objects in the viewfinder while filming. i would need to have the camera on a tripod to properly document the objects' trajectory. 

the objects disappeared into the distance in a southwest direction.
content.summary: A dozen satellite-like objects, in formation, moved across the sky at the same speed following the same path.

content.detailedDescription:
Good morning. it's been about a month now that i've been observing this strange light that seems to strobe (picture 100_1289) that is visible to the eye if one is looking hard. picture 100_1287 top left side you could see light. picture 100_1289 sunset after 7:00 p.M., monologue antena straight up very bright light. now picture 100_1287 i've been observing this strange light for the last two days after 5:00 a.M. when i took picture i notice these weird rainbow lights in the picture that i didn't see with naked eye i thought the picture was smuged but i looked at other stars around and they don't look blurry or smuged. today, 8/27/13' i saw that light again strobe like crazy, dimmed, disapperead & got very bright again & it did this twice, by the time i took out my camera it disappeared.  after viewing 100_1289 pictures in computer i notice two more objects one almost below & the other one jus towards the left where sky is a little more blue. on pictures you would have to zoom in to observe.

p.S. picture 100_1286 taken 08/26/13 @ 5:33 am & 100_1287 taken 08/26/13 @ 5:34 am i did this so you could see the before & after
picture 100_1289 taken 08/26/13 @ 7:33 pm bright light. zoom in monologue antenna & look straight up & you will not only see one but two more lights. first with naked eye only saw one bright light that flashes off & on but later saw in picture that there is two more. you would have to zoom in & search.
picture 100_1290 taken 08/27/13 @ 5:34 am i was trying to take a picture of strobing crazy light  that would dimm & then dissapear twice. as i was taking picture it disappeared.
content.summary: Strobe like crazy, dimmed, got very bright twice & disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Im a hostler in aurora that works the night shift. on 8/26/13 about 3:45 i was about to back a trailer in when i seen something out of the corner of my eye. i quickly turned my head and immeadiatly noticed an orion belt pattern in the sky. i then noticed two other craft of a different type on either side of the pattern of three. upon seeing all of this i began to have this overwelming feeling of fear. it all seemed very menacing. i pulled out my binoculars hoping mabe it was just stars previously not noticed. i focus in and there was no doubt this was not stars i was looking at. the craft to the left was a ship with an exterior light and other running lights could faintly be seen behind it. the three ships in the orion belt pattern where just bright lights. the craft to the right was pulsating red, blue, green, and white, and shaped like saturn. i back the trailer in and noticed two people out side having a smoke. i show them the objects and one of them took out his phone to check google star maps. he then says they are not stars. i let the other guy look through my binoculars and he agreed with me that these are definatly not stars or satelites. for the next three or so hours i try to focus on my job but they maintained pattern and omniously hovered above. i called my wife at one point who was twenty miles away and she could clearly see them as well. at one point in the morning there were so many ships that they covered the sky. i work near the airport and there is constant air traffic but while these strange ships occupied the sky, there wasnt any other air traffic. after the sun came up all but two craft where gone and about 6:15 the last two dissappeared. shortly afterwards i seen a commercial jet for the first time in three hours. i sometimes see strange things working the night shift and never report it, but this is different in the fact that there was an armada of ships and they didnt mind beeing seen.
content.summary: Star like craft decended quickly and formed orion belt pattern in sky with other type craft around all over

content.detailedDescription: Orb fleet over town watch for about 2 hours,many wittness..This was on friday 23rd,also sighting on the 26th will attach photo,i dont think i have to explain what you will be seeing ...On the second photo..Second photo was just me hunting around noon.....The orbs pictures i marked them with some red dots ,black dots but not on top of them...Last picture file 5 i was trying to get depth of the craft it is a snip it close up of the craft ..Ty,,
content.summary: Orb fleet,silver,white,orange ,danced around in the sky,many witnesses..

content.detailedDescription:
this past weekend i was spending some time out by lake arcadia. the fraternity that i am a member of(which is part of a near by university) just finished having our back to school get together with some of our members. the location of the site was right by the shore of the lake.
	it was about one o'clock in the morning and i was the last one there and had been by myself for around thirty minutes. it was my responsibility that night to let no one drive back home while intoxicated and make sure the camp site was in good shape when we were done. as a result of my duties that night i was completely sober and had not been drinking or using any drugs.
	right after i loaded the last bag of trash in the back of my truck i had this strange urge to look at the lake. the best way to describe that feeling  was as if i had been day dreaming. there was nothing unusual going on out on then all of the sudden there was a bright glowing light under  the water. at this particular distance i could tell exactly how large the circle was but it was big. 
	the shape was circular and had a light green/yellowish glow with occasional pulsating reed and blue lights. i starred at it dumbfounded as it was moving slowly under the water from one side of the lake to the opposite side. the object moved from one side and back to the other two or three times for about five minutes then it stopped almost near the center of the lake. the object glowed brighter and brighter than shot straight out of the water and into the sky.
	after that i turned around and ran as fast as i could to my truck. once i got to my truck i stopped and fumbled around in my pockets for a couple of seconds looking for my keys and seemingly out of no where a bright light appeared above and slightly behind me. i
	i turned around to see what was behind me and there was was this giant ship. it wasn't a saucer shaped one that everyone talks about  but it had more of a cake shape. it hand't landed but just hovered around twenty to thirty feet off the ground for a couple of seconds. then shot back up into the sky.
	i turned back to my truck door and tried to unlock it when i caught something at the corner of my. i jumped back against the side of my truck and about 15 feet away stood three people staring at me that had not been there prior to this incident. there were two very attractive woman and one very tall man that was at least ten feet high. all of them had blonde hair that was almost white and blue eyes. 
	they did not say anything to me directly but i heard one of the the woman's voice in my head. i know your probably thinking that i am crazy but it did happen. she said, "(my name) please do not be afraid. you have an important role to play if you would like to help us." i said out loud in a shaky voice "okay but i don't know how?" then the woman said, "don't worry you will know in time." right after she said that everything went black.
	eventually i woke up around two thirty. laying about thirty feet away from my last remembered position at the side of my truck.
content.summary: Bright light underwater of a lake that shot out of the water than hovered over me than had contact

content.detailedDescription: Myself and my cousin were driving back home from taco bell on route 37 when we saw two unidentified flying objects in the the sky. they looked like two huge black triangles with lights around the perimeter. at first from a distance we thought they were helicopters because they were just hovering in place without moving but as we got closer we noticed that there was no sound. they were situated off of lakehurst road over the neighborhood across the street from the miracle bar. there was no forward or backward movement and they seemed to be motionless hovering in the air. we continued down lakehurst road and lost sight of them once we turned down the road i live on. both of us were completely sober at the time and had always remained skeptical of ufos until tonight. did anyone else see what we saw? if so please post about it so we know we are not insane.
content.summary: 2 black triangles hovering over toms river

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking with my neighbor when i first observed the pulsating object. i asked him if he could distinguish colors he did blue green white red and green. we ran up the road a little ways to see if we could get closer . we watched the ufo hover for about 15-20 mins and witnessed multiple airplanes fly by one airplane was headed towards the object and suddenly changed course. we watched the ufo vanish before our eyes. we never took our eyes off the craft.
content.summary: I was outside smoking with my neighbor when i first observed the pulsating object. i asked him if he could destinguish colors he did blue green white red and green. we ran up the road a little ways to see if we could get closer .

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to sit on my porch around 8:30 p.M. and saw a large oval object in the distance with lights that flashed hovering. it was up in the sky perhaps a little above the trees across town perhaps a mile away. it did not move like a helicopter or plane. it caught my attention.
it didn't move for about 15 min and then started northwest slowly,closer to my house. it stopped and went again always with the bright lights. i knew they were lights because i went and retrieved my binoculars and saw it was an oval type body with the perimeter flashing lights. that was the 3rd. it was there for about 11/2hr. the next evening my two acquaintances  saw lights as described above hovering as they drove up the freeway and down the hwy turnoff to my house. they called and asked me to go outside and look and tell them if it was the same thing i saw on the 3rd. it was. my neighbor also saw it that night at the same time. at one point after about 3 hours. it just zipped out of sight up and away. i used to not believe in ufo's but now i do because i realized it was unlike anything i have ever seen. the others agree that there is no explanation other than ufo.
dictated and contact person neighbor  per request of observer.
content.summary: A large object with flashing lights around perimeter hovered and moved along. it appeared btwo nights in a row. two in neighborhood observed

content.detailedDescription: I was letting my dogs out for the night.  i always look at the stars, so i left the porch light off as usual.  immediately, the object caught my eye.  i noticed it moving in a somewhat figure eight pattern, as if to make the infinite symbol from my angle of view.  the pattern was very small.  i'm assuming it was rather far away.  the object was a glowing orange/yellow orb.  at first, i denied myself the truth blaming it on my eyes.  then it dissapeared.  i thought maybe a cloud, but the skies were clear as far as i could tell.  then, it reappeared.  the movement became more noticeable.  now it was moving to the east in a jumping fashion, as if it were bouncing left to right.  as well, the object appeared to move up and down slightly. it dissapeared again.  reappeared for about two seconds, and then suddenly like a light went out it was gone.  i can't beleive it.  i am developing a new outlook on life as i type this message.  i am setting up a camera by the back door.  hope to see it again.  scared as you know what to go outside at night now though.  wish me luck.
content.summary: Holy $hit.  i have never seen anything like this before.   ever!  crazy.  i am a believer.

content.detailedDescription:
At approx  5:35am this morning, i stepped out into my backyard. i looked to my left.  i observed an 
object moving sw extremely slowly.  if it hadn't been occluded by a small tree branch, i might not have noticed it at all. at that point, it was very dim.  (i���m comparing magnitudes from nearby stars to estimate brightness of object.)
i stepped back across my yard to get a better view, when the object abruptly changed 90��� south.  that is, away from me. it did not bank like an airplane. at no time, viewing visibly, or with the 10 x 40mm binoculars i grabbed, did i see anything resembling an ac (anti-collision) light that would be on any aircraft.  after a minute or two, the object began brightening and dimming.
 i began seeing faint flashes of yellow light emanating from the object which began to ���dance��� up and down, staying in same approx space.  multiple flashes of light around the object after 10 minutes of observation object dimmed and became still.
i got a better look at it towards the end, as i believe it began gaining altitude. the object, which started out as a whitish color, gradually turned more yellow.  at the end, it became a golden color, but i believe that was caused by the rising sun reflecting off of it. when it was brightest, i observed through the binoculars, that the end closest to me was conical, much like the bottom of the command module from the apollo space program.  i was viewing this from off to one side.  the object appeared to taper off, but i couldn't tell if the other end was blunt, rounded or pointed.I wish i had thought to contact the control tower at allegheny county airport to see if they had a visual or radar contact.  it should have been visible directly to their e or se. i had to break off my observation at that point, in order to get to work on time.
i had to break off my observation at that point, in order to get to work on time.
(the next is some magnitudes for comparison.)
delta aquila is approx. a 3.5 magnitude star.  this is the star that was closest to the object at the start of my observation. the object was dimmer at first, but became much brighter later.
at its brightest, i would say it was equal to viewing saturn, which has a magnitude of 0.
oh.  temp was approx 62.  wind was 4mph out of the south. barometric pressure was approx  3.2 and steady.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Slow moving object. sudden 90' turn. pulsated. brightened.

content.detailedDescription:
I had departed work at 3:35pm  friday august 23 while waiting at a red light i observed southwest flight wn476 departing seatac intl.  the blue and red colors were very recognizable as the commercial plane started to ascend i noticed a silver cigar shaped object in line of sight from my stopped vehicle past the sw flt and an additional 1/2 to 1 mile away at 70 degrees from the horizon.  the craft was not moving.  it look similar to the fuselage of a 737 american airliner, but i could not see any wings or tail structure.  a told my passenger do you see that object that's just hovering there.  he tried to look through the front windshield but due to the angle he was unable to see it.  suddenly a light cloud opened a track through it the vehicle disappeared but i could see a contrail coming from where the end of the cigar shape was. it was moving at a relatively slow speed.  i could no longer see the vehicle but i could follow its movement by the contrail.  the light changed i looked forward then quickly back and the cloud had a slice through it and the contrail was gone.

i am an aerospace worker that works close to seatac airport.
content.summary: Watching sw flight wn476 depart seatac i witnessed a silver cigar shaped object hovering almost half mile above the departing commercial flight.  then a cloud parted and the craft moved through it leaving a single contral behind the fuselage of the object

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out in front of my girlfriends parents house just bsing with her when behind her beyond the treeline i saw what at first i thought was a shooting star, i see them a lot here, and was about to tell her i saw one, when it suddenly stopped and emitted a tremendously bright red colored light, much larger than any aircraft light i've ever seen before, it hovered for a sec and then slowly started moving northward. we kept talking back and forth considering what it could be, we have two small airports and a large one, plus a few helicopter pads, so seeing them is completely normal, neither of us could decide, joked about it being aliens then it started a swaying motion like it was zigzagging in the sky. it continued along the tree line, we think it was following the highway, just continuously pulsing, i walked along the side walk as i was moving, to see if i could get a better angle, and it started moving a little faster, from maybe 300 mph to 600 approximately, then i said to her, if this thing shoots up in the air i'm going to flip, i no sooner than said that, when it seemed to have either dimmed the light permanently, flew faster than anything i've ever seen or shot straight up in the air.  while war hint it we were too stunned to even move much, we were almost hypnotized by it, i didn't take any pictures, cheap prepaid phone, and no video devices were around, but i found out the next day, today, that a friend of mine who lives around 30 miles north from me had seen about the same thing at almost exactly the same time while out walking his dog. after witnessing this event i called my mother to know if she had heard of anything like it she kind of laughed told me it was whatever i was smokin makin me see things (we weren't smoking anything of course) then she joked about ufos which i wasn't even sure if i wanted to call it, then i did a we search on my cellphone, which brought up all kinds of ufo reports from people describing almost to a t exactly the same thing we had witnessed.  august 26,2013
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Huge pulsing light floating over entire city, baffled

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were on river road approaching the grayson intersection when we saw this bright white oval object sitting in the sky. it could not have been a planet or star because it looked like it was hovering in front of the mountains. i turned left onto grayson and looked out my rear view mirror and it was no longer there. nothing was obstructing my view. the whole incident lasted close to a minute.
content.summary: Bright ball of light near mountain

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i both were witnesses to this ufo sighting in o'fallon,mo in patriot's landing subdivision on august 24, 2013.  all 6 - 7 of the glowing orange "objects" seemed to be flying somewhat low. they formed the what looked exactly like the big dipper.  that is what caught our eyes.  i got some footage of the event, although it is not very good. the best footage only lasts about 20 seconds.  i did a couple of not so great photos. each ufo hovered and smoothly went across the sky. at some pre-determined point, (so it seemed), each one went up to the sky and vanished.  it was like a fade-to-sky acension.
content.summary: The 6 -7 orange glowing ufo's formed the big dipper. they hovered and moved across the sky to ascend into the atmosphere.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my cousin and my dad. we saw a strange light in the sky coming from the west. at first we thought it was an airplane, but it kind of zig zaged a little bit but stayed on its course. we grabbed the binoculars to get a close look at it. it looked like to big blue lights. thats all they were. the thing that bothers us is when it was over our heads. the light got smaller and turned red. then it just, dissapeared. there were no clouds that night. just a crystal clear night. i don't know if it's an alien spacecraft, but i do know it is a ufo because it was flying, and me, my dad, and my cousin can't identify it. i wish i had a video of it but i don't. but i'm open to any explanation.
content.summary: Flow across the sky then dissapeared right over our heads.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: You will be able to view all this in slow motion 0.02 into the report by miguel almnagara with the beaver creek fire- boise idaho broadcasted on 8-19-2013. when you get o.O2 into this report as mentioned above, you should be viewing a hill side fire, a whirled wind very large and just to the left of this you should also be able to be viewing a much smaller whirlwind. this is what first peaked my interest as it seemed very uneasily and unnatural movement. so if you will rewind this to just before this hill side fire is shown, and start your slow motion viewing, pay very close attention from left to right, you should be able to view two orbs traveling in the direction i had stated. bur more importantly scrutinize all the area very closely and you should, as i did many time to make sure i was seeing what i was very much seeing. i f you have any ?S. at all please notify me.   singed this date of 8-26-13,  dennis m. moore
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 8-18-13 nbc 5:30pm 0.02 into rprt. beave crk fire slowmoition!

content.detailedDescription:
Now that i know these high-tech craft are real, i asked for one to show up. this was not the first time i asked, but it was earnest, and i asked for friendly ones only. about 15 minutes later i was looking at the sky from a chair in my front yard (head tilted back skyward), hoping to see a light zipping around the size of a star. the sky was clear and a large moon was rising, but not yet over the neighbor's tree level to the east, allowing for some darkness.Then pretty much right overhead i saw a form drifting east at about 200ft high and maybe 30mph. those numbers are only estimates. 
at first i thought, "what the heck it that" and then figured this could be a surprising cigar-form-ufo we so often hear about. since the sky was clear, with a little bit of city-light haze (but no clouds), i was at total loss to what this could be. i blinked my eyes and did a double check on the situation. since this object was mostly invisible, i questioned whether my eyes were playing tricks on the brain. but now i was alert and all i could do was keep tabs.
it moved from overhead (with a darkish form) going east towards the moon (but off to my right or south ever so slightly). as it moved the only visible form seemed to be the moon's reflection on the front rim of this huge (100ft dia.) round silent object, that was otherwise absolutely invisible. this reflection looked like a wisp of cloud floating through the night sky. but since the shape never changed and the direction and speed was constant, it was easy to look away and then find it again. then as it veered to the right (or south), the leading edge reflection started to fade as the moon light would be visible to some other observer (south of me) and no longer to me. being as how this thing was in invisible-mode, i soon lost sight of it. the total visible flight time was about 30 to 45 seconds. i doubt others would have seen this. i was quite lucky it passed directly overhead and that the moon was aligned for a perfect reflection. obviously, i asked them (the space people)to come back over again (in the form of a prayer), but alas, this was probably just a coincidence. if anyone saw this, please confirm. it made me wonder if it was a military craft in silent-invisible-mode. i think space-people they could have done a better job, unless they came specifically to show me their "reality" as a confirmation of my request. the next step is to go outside of the city and make the same request. who knows, but those were my thoughts.Cheers
content.summary: Round silent slow moving transparent craft overhead with lunar-reflection on leading edge.

content.detailedDescription: Well myself and about 6 friends were sittin around a fire and havin a few drinks on a beautiful summer night and we noticed a glow in the distance that was red/orange. we all observed it and it was moving down towards the earth then disaperred. i mentioned to my friend he shoulda had his camera or binoculars that he has in his vehicle. ( last year at this same moment he was driving on the highway jus above the valley at about 945pm n it was really foggy. he turned his head and noticed something massive a blink shaped object with pulsating grid of red lights. he said it was very big like 3-4 houses long and was hovering near the ground and was about 100-200 meters from him. he turned his head to watch the road then looked back n it was gone. it was a very weird fog that night n almost perfect night for somethin like that to stealth. he noticeda part of the object was blacked out. see he told me all this after he approached me at my hoise 10min after he seen this he is a big guy and its hard to scare him n he was terrified looked like he was gonna have a heart attack. we drove back up there together to see if we can find anything but all there was was fog. unfortunetly he didnt have cell phone or camera with him that night. .... but lets get back to the other night this year ok so after it vanished i went n got binoculars n hey in about 15-20 min after the firstsightin it showed up again!! this time headin up towards the sky slowly hovering n pulsing red n orange ...I used the binoculars n it was far but man was the object big length wise!!! it was not a star not a satelite not a plane not a helicopter ,, it was some kind of aircraft n i believe it was ufo. there has been lots of stories around this area and its a hot spot.
content.summary: Glowing object in sky
